pkgmetadata.longdescription: Psycopg 3: PostgreSQL database adapter for Python - Connection Pool===================================================================This distribution contains the optional connection pool package`psycopg_pool`__... __: https://www.psycopg.org/psycopg3/docs/advanced/pool.htmlThis package is kept separate from the main ``psycopg`` package because it islikely that it will follow a different release cycle.You can also install this package using:: pip install "psycopg[pool]"Please read `the project readme`__ and `the installation documentation`__ formore details... __: https://github.com/psycopg/psycopg#readme.. __: https://www.psycopg.org/psycopg3/docs/basic/install.html #installing-the-connection-poolCopyright (C) 2020 The Psycopg Team
